snippet: This modest, assured and cautionary gangland character study starring Vincent Piazza and Patricia Arquette isn’t short on mob cred.
abstract: Andy Webster reviews movie The Wannabe, directed and written by Nick Sandow and starring Vincent Piazza and Patricia Arquette.
lead_paragraph: This modest, assured and cautionary gangland character study starring Vincent Piazza and Patricia Arquette isn’t short on mob cred.

headline.main: Review: In ‘The Wannabe,’ Drugs, Money and Aspirations to Join the Gotti Circle
headline.print_headline: Review: In ‘The Wannabe,’ Drugs, Money and Aspirations to Join the Gotti Circle
